Package smile.deep.tensor

Class Index

java.lang.Object
smile.deep.tensor.Index
public class Index extends Object
Indexing a tensor.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Index
    Colon
    The colon (:) is used to slice all elements of a dimension.
    static Index
    Ellipsis
    The ellipsis (...) is used to slice higher-dimensional data structures as in numpy.

  • Field Details

    • Ellipsis

      public static Index Ellipsis
      The ellipsis (...) is used to slice higher-dimensional data structures as in numpy. It's designed to mean at this point, insert as many full slices (:) to extend the multi-dimensional slice to all dimensions.

    • Colon

      public static Index Colon
      The colon (:) is used to slice all elements of a dimension.

  • Method Details

    • index

      public static Index index(long i)
      Returns the index of a single element in a dimension.
      Parameters:
      i - the element index.
      Returns:
      the index.

    • index

      public static Index index(long... indices)
      Returns the index of multiple elements in a dimension.
      Parameters:
      indices - the indices of multiple elements.
      Returns:
      the index.

    • slice

      public static Index slice(Long start, Long end)
      Returns the slice index for [start, end) with step 1.
      Parameters:
      start - the start index.
      end - the end index.
      Returns:
      the slice.

    • slice

      public static Index slice(Long start, Long end, Long step)
      Returns the slice index for [start, end) with the given step.
      Parameters:
      start - the start index.
      end - the end index.
      step - the incremental step.
      Returns:
      the slice.
